segments.source_content:
---
id: diagrams
title: Diagrams
description: Writing diagrams with Mermaid
slug: /markdown-features/diagrams
---
# Diagrams
Diagrams can be rendered using [Mermaid](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/) in a code block.

translations.zh-hant: 可使用 [Mermaid](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/) 程式碼區塊來渲染圖表。

segments.source_content: ## Installation {#installation}

```bash npm2yarn
npm install --save @docusaurus/theme-mermaid
```
Enable Mermaid functionality by adding plugin `@docusaurus/theme-mermaid` and setting `markdown.mermaid` to `true` in your `docusaurus.config.js`.

translations.zh-hant: 在 `docusaurus.config.js` 中啟用 Mermaid 功能：添加插件 `@docusaurus/theme-mermaid` 並將 `markdown.mermaid` 設為 `true`。

segments.source_content: ## Usage {#usage}
Add a code block with language `mermaid`:

translations.zh-hant: 添加標記為 `mermaid` 語言的程式碼區塊：

segments.source_content: See the [Mermaid syntax documentation](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/./n00b-syntaxReference) for more information on the Mermaid syntax.

translations.zh-hant: 更多 Mermaid 語法說明請參閱 [Mermaid 語法文件](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/./n00b-syntaxReference)。

segments.source_content: ## Theming {#theming}
The diagram dark and light themes can be changed by setting `mermaid.theme` values in the `themeConfig` in your `docusaurus.config.js`. You can set themes for both light and dark mode.

translations.zh-hant: 可透過在 `docusaurus.config.js` 的 `themeConfig` 中設定 `mermaid.theme` 值來變更圖表的深色/淺色主題，同時支援為兩種顯示模式分別設定主題。

segments.source_content: See the [Mermaid theme documentation](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/theming) for more information on theming Mermaid diagrams.

translations.zh-hant: Mermaid 圖表主題設定詳情請參閱 [Mermaid 主題文件](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/theming)。

segments.source_content: ## Mermaid Config {#configuration}
Options in `mermaid.options` will be passed directly to `mermaid.initialize`:

translations.zh-hant: `mermaid.options` 中的參數將直接傳遞給 `mermaid.initialize`：

segments.source_content: See the [Mermaid config documentation](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/./Setup?id=configuration) and the [Mermaid config types](https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid/blob/master/packages/mermaid/src/config.type.ts) for the available config options.

translations.zh-hant: 可用配置選項請參閱 [Mermaid 配置文件](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid/#/./Setup?id=configuration) 與 [Mermaid 配置類型定義](https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid/blob/master/packages/mermaid/src/config.type.ts)。

segments.source_content: ## Dynamic Mermaid Component {#component}
To generate dynamic diagrams, you can use the `Mermaid` component:

translations.zh-hant: 欲生成動態圖表，可使用 `Mermaid` 元件：
